Scholar and occasional poet | location= | affiliation=The [[Notion Club]] | language=[[wikipedia:English language|English]] | birth=[[1928]] | birthlocation= | rule= | death= | deathlocation= | age= | notablefor= | house= | parentage= | siblings= | spouse= | children= | gender=Male | height= | hair= | eyes= | clothing= | weapons= | steed= }} Dr. '''Abel Pitt''' (born in [[1928]]) was a member of the [[Notion Club]]. == History == Dr. Abel Pitt was educated at Trinity College and was once the [[wikipedia:Trinity College, Oxford|Chaplain of Trinity College]] at [[Oxford]]. He later became a [[wikipedia:Bishop of Buckingham|Bishop of Buckingham]].
